sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of numerous types of li ji 痢疾 , the ailment of free-flux illness. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 15: 泄注，五痢，便膿血，重下腹痛，灸小腸俞百壯 , “For outflow, the five types of free-flux illness , defecation with pus and blood, a feeling of heavy pressure in the lower section of the body with abdominal pain, cauterize the small intestine transportation point one hundred times”.
